channel.title: CVE Feed for Adobe -- Adobe Experience Manager Forms
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Adobe -- Adobe Experience Manager Forms

item.title: CVE-2018-19724|2024-08-05T11:44:20.126Z -- adobe -- adobe%20experience%20manager%20forms
item.description: Adobe Experience Manager Forms versions 6.2, 6.3 and 6.4 have a stored cross-site scripting vulnerability. Successful exploitation could lead to sensitive information disclosure.
